snippet: David E. Acker, the owner of Harmony Vineyards on the North Shore, which opened in June, plans to donate his profits to charitable groups.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column; David E Acker, owner of Harmony Vineyards in Head of the Harbor Village on the North Shore, plans to give winery's proceeds to charity (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: David E. Acker, the owner of Harmony Vineyards on the North Shore, which opened in June, plans to donate his profits to charitable groups.

headline.seo: From Harmony Vineyards, Wine for Pleasure and Profits for Charity
